section.p: This class identifies observations outcome related to Soft Tissue (Head & Neck) Exam.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
This is the unique identifier of the dental encounter record.

Contains exactly one [1..1] comments with data type String
Remarks by the Provider on HeadNeck findings.

Contains exactly one [1..1] headNeckDescription with data type String
Remarks by the Provider on HeadNeck findings.

Contains exactly one [1..1] isResolved with data type Boolean
Indicates whether or not this head & neck transaction has been resolved. Possible values are TRUE; FALSE

Contains exactly one [1..1] markerColor with data type Real
The color of the marker used to indicate the lesion used in treatment planning

Contains exactly one [1..1] markerShape with data type Code
The shape of the marker used to indicate the lesion used in treatment planning. Possible values are rectangle; square; oval; circle; rounded rectangle; rounded square.

Contains exactly one [1..1] markerSize with data type Code
The size of the marker used to indicate the lesion used in treatment planning

Contains exactly one [1..1] xCoordinate with data type Integer
This is the X coordinate for the lesion. DRM Plus Program Specific.

Contains exactly one [1..1] yCoordinate with data type Integer
This is the Y coordinate for the lesion. DRM Plus Program Specific.

Contains zero or one [0..1] dentalProcedure, where its type is Dental Procedure
Dental Procedure provided.
Contains zero or one [0..1] masterLesionRecord, where its type is Soft Tissue Exam

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
This is the unique identifier of the dental encounter record.

Contains exactly one [1..1] comments with data type String
Remarks by the Provider on HeadNeck findings.

Contains exactly one [1..1] headNeckDescription with data type String
Remarks by the Provider on HeadNeck findings.

Contains exactly one [1..1] isResolved with data type Boolean
Indicates whether or not this head & neck transaction has been resolved. Possible values are TRUE; FALSE

Contains exactly one [1..1] markerColor with data type Real
The color of the marker used to indicate the lesion used in treatment planning

Contains exactly one [1..1] markerShape with data type Code
The shape of the marker used to indicate the lesion used in treatment planning. Possible values are rectangle; square; oval; circle; rounded rectangle; rounded square.

Contains exactly one [1..1] markerSize with data type Code
The size of the marker used to indicate the lesion used in treatment planning

Contains exactly one [1..1] xCoordinate with data type Integer
This is the X coordinate for the lesion. DRM Plus Program Specific.

Contains exactly one [1..1] yCoordinate with data type Integer
This is the Y coordinate for the lesion. DRM Plus Program Specific.

Contains zero or one [0..1] dentalProcedure, where its type is Dental Procedure
Dental Procedure provided.
Contains zero or one [0..1] masterLesionRecord, where its type is Soft Tissue Exam
